attributes.action: Change the mandatory GCSE from Religous education to a Language
attributes.additional_details: To have the upcoming year's to have different upcoming  mandatory choice besides from religious education because languages was a way better pick
attributes.background: Please just do this because I believe that religious education is a waste of a GCSE in my opinion.

rejection.details:
Religious education (RE) is not compulsory for all students to take at GCSE level.

We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Individual school boards decide if they want to make RE compulsory for their students at GCSE level.
